front.title: Export of BGP Prefix Origin Validation in IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX)

abstract.t: This document defines an IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX) Information Element for monitoring the state of Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RPKI) based BGP Prefix Origin Validation. The Information Element enables network operators to collect and analyze BGP route validation states (valid, invalid, not-found) to facilitate the detection of potential route hijacks improving network observability and security.
